SENT.plain: A 40-year-old female patient with Werner's syndrome (WS) suffering from thyroid cancer and myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) is reported
She had been diagnosed as having WS complicated with thyroid cancer seven years previously
Total thyroidectomy and radioactive iodine (131I, 100 mCi/year) therapy for seven years had slowed the progression of thyroid cancer
She suffered a sudden onset of MDS at the age of 40 years
After six months she died from overt leukemia
We found an additional chromosome aberration of chromosome 10 in the progression of leukemia from MDS
